title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4242.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4242.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

These regulations set forth the framework for the
administration by the New York State Urban Development Corporation d/b/a Empire

State Development Corporation (ESD or the Corporation) of the JOBS Now Program
(JOBS Now or the Program). JOBS Now is authorized under section 16-h of the New

York State Urban Development Corporation Act (the UDC Act). The program is
intended to promote the economic health of New York State (the State) and
increase economic activity within the State by encouraging the expansion of
business within the State and the attraction of businesses to the

State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4242.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
